org.fcrepo.mint

Class HttpPidMinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.mint.HttpPidMinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.kernel.identifiers.PidMinter

    public class HttpPidMinter
extends Object
implements org.fcrepo.kernel.identifiers.PidMinter
    PID minter that uses an external REST service to mint PIDs.
    Since:
    04/28/2014
    Author:
    escowles

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpPidMinter

        public HttpPidMinter(String url,
                     String method,
                     String username,
                     String password,
                     String regex,
                     String xpath)
        Create a new HttpPidMinter.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL for the minter service. This is the only required argument -- all other parameters can be blank.
        method - The HTTP method (POST, PUT or GET) used to generate a new PID (POST will be used if the method is blank.
        username - If not blank, use this username to connect to the minter service.
        password - If not blank, use this password used to connect to the minter service.
        regex - If not blank, use this regular expression used to remove unwanted text from the minter service response. For example, if the response text is "/foo/bar:baz" and the desired identifier is "baz", then the regex would be ".*:".
        xpath - If not blank, use this XPath expression used to extract the desired identifier from an XML minter response.

    • Method Detail

      • buildClient

        protected org.apache.http.client.HttpClient buildClient()
        Setup authentication in httpclient.
        Returns:
        the setup of authentication

      • responseToPid

        protected String responseToPid(String responseText)
                        throws IOException
        Remove unwanted text from the minter service response to produce the desired identifier. Override this method for processing more complex than a simple regex replacement.
        Parameters:
        responseText - the response text
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        IOException - if exception occurred

      • mintPid

        @Timed
public String mintPid()
        Mint a unique identifier using an external HTTP API.
        Specified by:
        mintPid in interface org.fcrepo.kernel.identifiers.PidMinter
        Returns:
        The generated identifier.
